name: Home Made
slogan: Changing the way people rent and let homes
description:
Home Made is changing the way Londoners rent and let properties. 

We aim to provide an exceptional rental experience to everyone grounded in trust and transparency.

We provide a suite of technological tools for both landlords and tenants, and we are committed to developing world-class tech solutions to support our customers and to provide a superior customer service.

Our proprietary platform provides transparency and control throughout the letting process.

Sentinel, our sublet protection tool -  the first of its kind world-wide - offers immediate detection of properties being sublet illegally.

Through our customer management platform, we are able to automatically match applicants to properties based on their exact search criteria.

Interested in more information about our technology and products? Visit us at: https://www.home-made.com

team.name: Asaf Navot
team.bioHtml:
Founder of Home Made. Former Bain&Company Team Leader, INSEAD MBA.

Obsessed with creating the best team of leaders to drive the business

team.title: Account Manager
team.name: Sidney Soares
team.bioHtml: Experienced Account Manager with a demonstrated history of working in the real estate and medical industry.

team.title: Demand Analyst
team.name: Federico Del Fante
team.bioHtml: Optimizer by nature, always combining problem-solving skills with a creative attitude to create the perfect balance between processes and innovation.

jobs.title: Sales Associate
jobs.description:
At Home Made we are on a mission to transform the lettings industry by bringing trust, transparency, and joy back to a process which is notorious for lacking all three. 

We believe that renting your home should be painless, straightforward and enjoyable for both landlord and tenant and we have created a model which delivers on all counts. 

With a customer centric approach (and some serious smart tech) we are delivering unrivaled results and our customer feedback means we are now the highest rated lettings provider in London. 

We don’t just talk a good talk, we deliver - and as a result we are now in a serious growth phase. 

A VC backed proptech, Home Made has raised £2m from major VC firms, but we’re only just getting started. 

We are looking for individuals to join the Home Made sales team and help set the pace for growth. You’ll be an integral member of the team, helping us achieve our vision to become the largest hybrid lettings provider in Europe. 

This is a customer facing role and you will be responsible for the entire journey, from initial enquiry to conducting viewings and extracting the offer. We provide a strong sales pipeline and conversion rates are high so the OTE are achievable for the right person with the right attitude.

As exceptional customer service is key, your success will be measured on the number of transactions as well as customer feedback.

### What excites you?
### 
* Working a sales pipeline and running an end-to-end sales process
* Delivering the highest level of customer service and having some seriously happy customers sing your praises
* Being part of an ambitious company with an amazing culture and the opportunity to really make a difference

### What excites us?
### 
* Enthusiastic, self-starting, results driven people with a passion for customer service and 9 to 18 months working in a customer facing role.
* Some experience working in sales, managing a sales pipeline and hitting targets (although not necessary for the right person as full training will be given)
* Ambitious people who thrive in a fast paced, high-growth environment, can work collaboratively as part of an amazing team and contribute to overall company objectives
* Excellent communicators - you’re naturally charming, charismatic and able to establish a rapport with your customers
* Fantastic organisational skills so you can manage and prioritise your time/tasks effectively
* Quick thinkers, capable of assessing a customer’s needs
* Disillusioned industry (Estate Agency) people who know their current customers deserve better

No previous real estate experience is required, but an eagerness to get up to speed quickly/learn about the industry is a must.

We have a welcoming, supportive and diverse team, and we invest in our people. Our culture is our biggest asset and something we simply don’t compromise on.

With an incredible management team, we are committed to giving you the opportunities and any training you need to succeed creating a clear path for career progression.

Feel free to get in touch directly with us at joinus@home-made.com.

### Compensation

Basic £25K
OTE £55,000+

### Benefits
### 
Share options for top performers
Incentive rewards 
Team socials and activities
Coffee and loads of delicious snacks in the office

jobs.title: Account Manager
jobs.description:
At Home Made (www.home-made.com) we are on a mission to transform the lettings industry by bringing trust, transparency (and joy) back to a process which has become known for lacking all three. 

We believe that renting your home should be painless, straightforward and enjoyable for both landlord and tenant and we have created a model which delivers on all counts. 

With a customer centric approach (and some serious smart tech) we are delivering unrivaled results and our customer feedback means we are now the highest rated lettings provider in London. 

We don’t just talk a good talk, we deliver - and as a result we are now in a serious growth phase. 

A VC backed proptech, Home Made has raised £2m from major VC firms, but we’re only just getting started. 

We are looking for individuals to join the Home Made sales team in a senior role and help set the pace for growth. You’ll be an integral member of the team, helping us achieve our vision to become the largest hybrid lettings provider in Europe. 

This is a client facing role and you will be responsible for the growth of our private landlord channel. Proficient at pitch delivery and closing the sale you will win, manage and nurture your accounts with ongoing responsibility for client retention and growth. We provide a strong sales pipeline of qualified leads but some prospecting will be required. Conversion rates are high so the OTE are more than achievable for the right person with the right attitude.

As exceptional customer service is key, your success will be measured on the number of transactions as well as customer feedback.

### What excites you?
### 
* The opportunity to join a well funded scaling start-up on a mission to disrupt the lettings industry
* Working a sales pipeline and owning an end to end sales process
* Delivering the highest level of customer service and having some seriously happy clients sing your praises
* Being part of an ambitious company with an amazing culture and the opportunity to really make a difference

### What excites us?

* Enthusiastic, self-starting, results driven people with a passion for delivering exceptional customer service and hitting targets 
* Ambitious people who thrive in a fast paced, high-growth environment, can work collaboratively as part of an amazing team and contribute to overall company objectives
* Excellent communicators - you’re naturally charming, charismatic and able to establish rapport with your clients
* Masters of the sale, with a diligent ‘perfect pitch’ approach and a closing mentality
* Fantastic organisational skills so you can manage and prioritise your time/tasks effectively
* Quick thinkers, capable of assessing a customer’s needs
* Disillusioned industry (Estate Agency) people who know their current customers deserve better

Experience in a landlord facing role is essential. 

We have a welcoming, supportive and diverse team, and we invest in our people. Our culture is our biggest asset and something we simply don’t compromise on.

With an incredible management team, we are committed to giving you the opportunities and any training you need to succeed creating a clear path for career progression.

Feel free to get in touch directly with us at joinus@home-made.com.

### Compensation

Basic £20K 
On Target Earnings £50-70K

### Benefits

•	Share options for top performers
•	Team socials and activities
•	A once in a lifetime opportunity to shape the way people live

jobs.title: Marketing Associate
jobs.description:
At Home Made we are on a mission to transform the lettings industry by bringing trust, transparency, and joy back to a process which is notorious for lacking all three. 

We believe that renting your home should be painless, straightforward and enjoyable for both landlord and tenant and we have created a model which delivers on all counts. 

With a customer centric approach (and some serious smart tech) we are delivering unrivaled results and our customer feedback means we are now the highest rated lettings provider in London. 

We don’t just talk a good talk, we deliver - and as a result we are now in a serious growth phase. 

A VC backed proptech, Home Made has raised £2m from major VC firms, but we’re only just getting started. 

We are looking for an individual to join the Home Made marketing & growth team and help position our brand. You’ll be an integral member of the team, helping us achieve our vision to become the largest hybrid lettings provider in Europe. 

You will be responsible for redefining the way we interact and communicate with our customers and will own engagement and campaigns across multiple channels. Alongside this you will provide key support to internal teams by developing marketing materials, bespoke pitch decks and presentations with consistent brand messaging.

**What excites you:
**
* Working in a well funded start-up in a major growth phase
* Being part of building a potentially global brand
* Being part of an ambitious company with an amazing culture and the opportunity to really make a difference.

**What excites us:
**
* Enthusiastic, self-starting people with a creative spirit and eye for strong, impactful design.
* Someone confident in directing their own work and acting with autonomy
* Someone with a strong understanding of customer and market dynamics and requirements
* Fantastically organised people with excellent time and project management skills who have the ability to meet deadlines, within budget and under pressure
* A friendly attitude and team player
* Ambitious people who thrive in a fast paced, high-growth environment
* No previous real estate experience is required however an eagerness to quickly get up to speed/learn about the industry is a must.

2+ years’ experience either working in a marketing agency or in a marketing function in a start-up is preferred.

We have a welcoming, supportive and diverse team, and we invest in our people. Our culture is our biggest asset and something we simply don’t compromise on.

With an incredible management team, we are committed to giving you the opportunities and any training you need to succeed creating a clear path for career progression.

Feel free to get in touch directly with us at joinus@home-made.com.

Compensation:
•	£25,000 - £30,000, based on experience

Perks:
•	Share options for top performers
•	Team socials and activities
•	A once in a lifetime opportunity to shape the way people live

jobs.title: Field Operations Coordinator
jobs.description:
Home Made is a high-growth, VC-backed, property-technology startup offering an alternative to traditional lettings agencies. We’re based in Central London and offer a premium, full agency service but for a low online fee. On average we save landlords over £2,500 per annum and achieve an approval rating of over 95%. The business has a growing London-wide property portfolio and a strong customer pipeline. 
 
We have been recently short-listed for numerous awards, including The Amazon Business Growth Awards, UK&I Award for ‘Most Promising Company of 2018’, Resi Awards 2018, Property Wire Awards 2018, World Banking Awards Top 50 Most Innovative Brands, and were recently included in the Top-100 UK startups list on Startups.co.uk. 

We are looking for the perfect candidate for this key role. A passionate and committed Field Operations Coordinator to organise and plan the field operations of the Home Made Sales Team – helping to set the pace for growth. Ultimately, the Field Operations Coordinator will be responsible for coordinating key sales activities to achieve the effective distribution of appointments. 

The perfect Field Operations Coordinator has great written and verbal communication and negotiation skills. She/he is decisive and is able to build rapport and authority within a high performing environment. She/he is able to thrive in a fast-paced and changing environment – continually prioritising tasks to meet the demands of the role. The ideal candidate will be a fast learner and efficient and have great problem-solving abilities. 

The goal of this pivotal position is to support the smooth operations of a variety of channels aiming for maximum efficiency.


Responsibilities
•	Building rapport and managing relationships with both landlords and tenants to confirm access for a specific property
•	Manage the booked viewings through our CRM system (confirming and updating the correct information) 
•	Coordinate Sales Associates travel itinerary 
•	Regular Audit on all relevant information regarding access to make sure is up to date on the system for the Sales Associates to see
•	Multitasking and processing of several viewings simultaneously is a must
•	Updating both Sales Associates and landlords if there are any changes 
•	Responding promptly and professionally to calls and emails and making sure that all relevant parties from the company are updated

Requirements

•	BSc/MSc in Supply Chain, Logistics or relevant operational field – An advantage 
•	Proven record excelling in both personal and professional fields
•	Fine attention to detail wit completer – finisher mentality 
•	Operations and Customer Support experience
•	Excellent organisational skills and focus on optimisation
•	Excellent communication skills (written and verbal)
•	Excellent problem-solving abilities and focus on completing tasks quickly and efficiently
•	A hunger for continuous self-improvement
•	Thrive in a fast-paced and dynamic environment

jobs.title: Sales Intern
jobs.description:
At Home Made we are on a mission to transform the lettings industry by bringing trust, transparency (and joy) back to a process which has become known for lacking all three. 

We believe that renting your home should be painless, straightforward and enjoyable for both landlord and tenant and we have created a model which delivers on all counts. 

With a customer centric approach (and some serious smart tech) we are delivering unrivaled results and our customer feedback means we are now the highest rated lettings provider in London. 

We don’t just talk a good talk, we deliver - and as a result we are now in a serious growth phase. 

A VC backed proptech, Home Made has raised £2m from major VC firms, but we’re only just getting started. 

We are looking for individuals to join the Home Made sales/lead generation team and help set the pace for growth. You’ll be an integral member of the team, helping us achieve our vision to become the largest hybrid lettings provider in Europe. 

This is a customer facing, telesales role and with responsibility for incoming enquiries, you will be the first point of contact for potential customers. 

You will manage your own leads database (provided) with a mix of cold and warm calls to maximise opportunities. 

### What excites you?
### 
* Working in a well funded start-up in a major growth phase
* Delivering the highest level of customer service and having some seriously happy customers sing your praises
* Being part of an ambitious company with an amazing culture and the opportunity to really make a difference.
* Amazing career progression opportunities and continuous personal development 

### What excites us?
### 
* Enthusiastic, self-starting people with a passion for customer service and some experience working in a customer facing role.
* Confident communicators with a great telephone manner who are able to establish rapport with our customers
* Methodical, organised and diligent approach to working a leads database effectively
* Ambitious people who thrive in a fast paced, high-growth environment, can work collaboratively as part of an amazing team and contribute to overall company objectives

No previous real estate experience is required however an eagerness to quickly get up to speed/learn about the industry is a must.

We have a welcoming, supportive and diverse team, and we invest in our people. Our culture is our biggest asset and something we simply don’t compromise on.

With an incredible management team, we are committed to giving you the opportunities and any training you need to succeed creating a clear path for career progression.

Feel free to get in touch directly with us at joinus@home-made.com.

### Compensation
### 
Basic £20K

Top performers will be offered a full time role as a Sales Associate - OTE income of £45,000-£60,000 p.a.

### Perks

Share options for top performers
Regular sales incentive rewards
Regular team socials and activities
Coffee and loads of delicious snacks in the office
